name: PBSKIDSWashandSing
0:
”Alexa, open p. b. s. kids”
”Alexa, ask p. b. s. kids to wash and sing”
”Alexa, open p. b. s kids and wash and sing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. b. s. kids
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Washing your hands is extra fun when you can sing along! Play these PBS KIDS songs to help preschoolers wash their hands for at least 20 seconds. Sing along to songs from Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood, Arthur, Odd Squad and PBS KIDS nursery rhymes. Have fun washing and singing!

Say:
"Alexa, open PBS KIDS"
"Alexa, ask PBS KIDS to Wash and Sing"
"Alexa, open PBS KIDS and Wash and Sing"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
